title: ICE: assertion failed: !self.substitutions.is_empty()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust use std::result::Result; pub fn foo(v: Option>)->Result,Err>{ v.unwrap() } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (a15f484b9 2021-02-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: a15f484b918a4533ad633ea903ccce82910af342 commit-date: 2021-02-22 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0573]: expected type, found variant `Err` --> ice.rs:2:50 | 2 | pub fn foo(v: Option>)->Result,Err>{ | ^^^ not a type | thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: !self.substitutions.is_empty()', compiler\rustc_errors\src\lib.rs:189:9 stack backtrace: note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0-nightly (a15f484b9 2021-02-22) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fee486889e - ::fmt::h160322fcc0f12a19 1: 0x7fee48946eb - core::fmt::write::ha3ea633b18d2da75 2: 0x7fee485ba38 - ::fmt::h0a7d0dda807c93f1 3: 0x7fee486ca6d - std::panicking::take_hook::h7c389d310fc84231 4: 0x7fee486c539 -
